official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1968 and title 5 of the National Housing Act to prevent discrimination based on marital status.

summary.text: Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1968 to prohibit sex discrimination in the sale, rental, financing, or provision of brokerage services for housing and to prohibit housing intimidation based on sex or marital status. Amends the National Housing Act to prohibit marital status discrimination in the extension of mortgage assistance.
